welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Kelso, the charming city known for its rich history and stunning natural beauty. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in all that Kelso has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Longview Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Longview Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Troutdale Airport handles all commercial flights and includes various amenities for passengers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Troutdale Airport caters to private and charter flights, offering a more personalized and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is reserved for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
